data.message:
I'm only here because I want whoever you ppl are running this show.....whether you start to do anything about it or not, myself and MANY others in light of the NUMEROUS children losing their lives by suicide/bullying, will be reporting EVERY fight video we see.
Maybe if you start to pull them and maybe ground the accts that post them for a few days as punishment, this disgusting epidemic will at least stop being perpetuated by your outlet.
Of course until maybe one of your children or friends is the victim you don't care but there are way to many who do and you shouldn't let the forum you make all your $$$$ from leave a bad taste in ppls mouths
